meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Donna Laux Rob Landolfi Chris Fleitas Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6215.

td.p: Donna Laux, a marketing director from New Braunfels, Texas
Rob Landolfi, an environmental protection specialist from Washington, D.C.
Chris Fleitas, a high school college prep counselor from San Francisco, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $38,900)

tr.td: BLU-RAYS
WHO MAKES IT?
ADD A LETTER
LANDMARKS
SURPRISE PARTY
(Alex: And finally, Ken Burns's [*], that's a new series that will premiere this Sunday on PBS.)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_3_1', 'clue_J_3_1_stuck', 'Add a letter to "hotel" & you end up with this less-expensive lodging place')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Add a letter to "hotel" & you end up with this less-expensive lodging place
